basic_serializer.hpp

00001 #ifndef  BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_SERIALIZER_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_SERIALIZER_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_serializer.hpp: extenstion of type_info required for serialization.
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 #include <cassert>
00020 #include <cstddef> // NULL
00021 
00022 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/serialization/extended_type_info.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace boost {
00027 namespace archive {
00028 namespace detail {
00029 
00030 class basic_serializer : private boost::noncopyable
00031 {
00032     const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & m_eti;
00033 protected:
00034     explicit basic_serializer(
00035         const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & eti
00036     ) : 
00037         m_eti(eti)
00038     {
00039         assert(NULL != & eti);
00040     }
00041 public:
00042     const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & get_eti() const {
00043         return m_eti;
00044     }
00045 };
00046 
00047 inline bool 
00048 operator<(const basic_serializer & lhs, const basic_serializer & rhs)  {
00049   return & lhs.get_eti() < & rhs.get_eti();
00050 }
00051 
00052 class basic_serializer_arg : public basic_serializer {
00053 public:
00054     basic_serializer_arg(const serialization::extended_type_info & eti) :
00055         basic_serializer(eti)
00056     {}
00057 };
00058 
00059 } // namespace detail
00060 } // namespace archive
00061 } // namespace boost
00062 
00063 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_SERIALIZER_HPP
